title: fried chicken wings with barbecue sauce and griddled fillet steak with chilli sauce
description: Quick and easy, but so rewarding. Make your own sweet, sticky sauces for this chicken and steak meat-fest - ideal for the barbecue.
ingredients: olive or sunflower oil, for deep-frying
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 chipotle chilli, soaked in water and finely chopped
2 tbsp flatleaf parsley, finely chopped, to serve
